title: Cardiovascular system pharmaceuticals in Finland 2021 | Statista
author: Matej Mikulic; Aug
description: The consumption of drugs acting on the cardiovascular system in Finland increased by 27.8 dosages per 1,000 inhabitants per day (+4.24 percent) in 2021.
cleaned_text: Cardiovascular system pharmaceutical consumption in Finland 2009-2021 [The consumption of drugs acting on the cardiovascular system in Finland increased by 27.8 dosages per 1,000 inhabitants per day (+4.24 percent) in 2021. Therefore, the consumption in Finland reached a peak in 2021 with 683 dosages per 1,000 inhabitants per day.](#statisticContainer) Find more key insights for the consumption of drugs acting on the cardiovascular system in countries like
